metadata.title: CVE-2017-15056 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.94 mishandles ELF headers, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by anInvalid Pointer Read in PackLinuxElf64::unpack().

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
